code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  maximumWealth ( vector < vector < int >>&  accounts )  {   return  accumulate ( accounts . begin (),  accounts . end (),  0 ,   []( int  subtotal ,  const  vector < int >&  account )  {   return  max ( subtotal ,  accumulate ( account . begin (),  account . end (),  0 ));   });   }  };
